Sentencas: A Co-free perovskite material, La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-6, is synthesized and electrochemically characterized to evaluate its potential application as electrocatalyst in the air electrode of solid oxide cells.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: The powder was firstly synthesized by the sol-gel method and subsequently morphologically and structurally characterized by scanning electron microscope and X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: Symmetrical circular button cells featuring Sm-doped ceria (20% Sm) as supporting electrolyte and La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-6 as electrocatalyst were manufactured to carry out elec-trochemical investigations.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: Two different electrode morphologies are analyzed.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: In the first structure, the La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-6 calcined powders are directly deposited by slurry coating on a dense sintered sup-porting pellet of Sm-doped ceria.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: In the second electrode configuration, the precursor solution of La0.7Sr0.3-Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-6 impregnates a porous scaffold of Sm-doped ceria, previously deposited and co-sintered with the supporting electrolyte.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: The performance of the samples was studied by means of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, measuring polarization resistances of 0.0153 & omega;& BULL;cm2 at 700 degrees C and 0.052 & omega;& BULL;cm2 at 600 degrees C for the slurry coated and infiltrated electrodes, respectively.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: These values, according to the authors knowledge, are amongst the lowest ever obtained for Co-free solid oxides electrodes.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation

Sentencas: However, the very high electrocatalytic activity obtained at intermediate temperatures is not accompanied by chemical stability over time.
Titulo: A high-performance Co-free electrode for solid oxide cells: La0.7Sr0.3Cu0.15Fe0.85O3-δ synthesis and characterisation
